idea:
ILXS Pvt. Ltd., a company with the mission to revolutionize the documentation experience for the defence sector. We provide services of digitising documentation using products such as Interactive Electronic Technical Manual, Computer Based Training module and S1000D compliant documents.
 
We are a group of engineers from documentation background and we are leveraging technology to provide an optimised documentation experience.
 
We believe that the digital documentation will significantly reduce the repair and maintenance times of complex defence systems. It will also help new users to learn about systems in a very short span.
 
Kindly visit our website https://ilxs.in to view the products at offer.
name: ILXS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Bombay Engineer Service and Works Private Limited is Company providing manpower and carry out all type of civil works in Indian Railways and Indian Armed Forces.
name: BOMBAY ENGINEER SERVICE AND WORKS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ITNovate is a start-up Company with young, energetic and highly skilled professionals.

ITNovate mainly focus on IT system integration, IT Consultancy, software design and development as well as professional services and hardware deployment and maintenance.

We have entered the age of digital technology. Amongst all the sectors, information technology is following and will pave a path for faster growth. In fact e-business is becoming the most favored word with corporate as it took over from traditional business practices.

A clear perception of the growing requirement of the corporate world in the area of IT has enabled us to develop programs of specific relevance for the present and the future.
name: ITNOVATE CONSULTANCY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: One-m is basically convenient store startup. We called ourself is modern desi mart, a modern version of desi kirana stores. We operate in offline and online in both the segment. Our focus is to make daily shopping is more convenient for every customer with organize way. Our target is to open 50,000 outlet all over the india with 3lakh employment.
name: ONE-M
